I tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he will <S%G4160><s%> avenge <S%G1557><s%> them <S%G846><s%> <S%G99999><s%> speedily <S%G5034><s%>. I fast <S%G3522><s%> twice <S%G1364><s%> in the week <S%G4521><s%>, I give tithes <S%G586><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3745><s%> I possess <S%G2932><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the tax collector <S%G5057><s%>, standing <S%G2476><s%> afar off <S%G3113><s%>, would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lift up <S%G1869><s%> so much as <S%G3761><s%> his eyes <S%G3788><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> struck <S%G5180><s%> upon <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> breast <S%G4738><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, God <S%G2316><s%> be merciful <S%G2433><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> a sinner <S%G268><s%>.

I tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, this man <S%G3778><s%> went down <S%G2597><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> rather than <S%G2228><s%> the other <S%G1565><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> exalts <S%G5312><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be abased <S%G5013><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> humbles <S%G5013><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be exalted <S%G5312><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they brought <S%G4374><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> infants <S%G1025><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he would touch <S%G680><s%> them <S%G846><s%>: but when <S%G1161><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it <S%G2008><s%>, they rebuked them <S%G846><s%>.

Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%>, Whoever <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G1209><s%> not <S%G3362><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a little child <S%G3813><s%> shall <S%G1525><s%> in <S%G3756><s%> no wise <S%G3364><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> <S%G99999><s%> in it <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> ruler <S%G758><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Good <S%G18><s%> Master <S%G1320><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> shall I do <S%G4160><s%> to inherit <S%G2816><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2816><s%>?

Then <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%>, we <S%G2249><s%> have left <S%G863><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> you <S%G4671><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they shall scourge <S%G3146><s%> him <S%G615><s%>, and put him <S%G846><s%> to death <S%G615><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> he shall rise again <S%G450><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, that as <S%G1722><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was come near <S%G1448><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jericho <S%G2410><s%>, a certain <S%G5100><s%> blind man <S%G5185><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the way side <S%G3598><s%> begging <S%G4319><s%>:

And <S%G1161><s%> they told <S%G518><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth <S%G3480><s%> passes by <S%G3928><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> he cried <S%G994><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, Son <S%G5207><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>, have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on me <S%G3165><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him <S%G846><s%>, Receive your sight <S%G308><s%>: your <S%G4675><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> has saved <S%G4982><s%> you <S%G4571><s%>.
